name: reconstruct_3d_face_from_mri
description: Generate a 3D model of facial anatomy from MRI scans of the head and neck.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: mri_file_path
inputs.description: Path to the MRI scan file (NIfTI format: .nii or .nii.gz)

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: Directory where output files will be saved

inputs.name: subject_id
inputs.description: Identifier for the subject, used in output filenames

inputs.name: threshold_value
inputs.description: Threshold value for initial segmentation of facial tissues

output.description: Research log detailing the reconstruction process and output file locations
